ayas.translation: By the heaven with its Houses,
by the Promised Day,
by the Witness and the Witnessed:
perish the People of the Ditch!
The fire abounding in fuel,
above which they sat

ayas.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
ayas.translation: as they were themselves witnesses to what they did to the faithful.
ayas.transliteration: wahum `alā mā yaf`alūna bil mu-minīna shuhūd

ayas.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
ayas.translation: They were vindictive towards them only because they had faith in Allah, the All-mighty and the All-laudable,
ayas.transliteration: wa mā naqamū minhum illā an yu-minū billāhil `azīzil ḥamīd

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
ayas.translation: to whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and Allah is witness to all things.
ayas.transliteration: alladhī lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
ayas.translation: Indeed those who persecute the faithful, men and women, and do not repent thereafter, there is the punishment of hell for them and the punishment of burning.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna fatanul mu-minīna wal mu-mināti thumma lam yatūbū falahum `adhābu jahannama walahum `adhābul ḥarīq

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: Indeed those who have faith and do righteous deeds—for them will be gardens with streams running in them. That is the supreme success.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۚ dhālikal fawzul kabīr

ayas.translation: Indeed your Lord’s striking is severe.
It is indeed He who originates and brings back,
and He is the All-forgiving, the All-affectionate,
Lord of the Throne, the All-glorious,
doer of what He desires.
Did you receive the story of the hosts
of Pharaoh and Thamud?
Indeed the faithless dwell in denial,
and Allah besieges them from all around.
Indeed it is a glorious Quran,
in a preserved tablet.
